trans-unit.source:
\n

Specifies the column that is displayed in the referred table as a foreign-key column.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxx xxxx xx xxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxxx xx x xxxxxxx$xxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The name of the column to use as the display column.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxx xx xxx xx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The name of the column to use as the display column.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxx xx xxx xx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The name of the column to use for sorting.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxx xx xxx xxx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The name of the column to use as the display column.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxx xx xxx xx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The name of the column to use for sorting.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxx xx xxx xxx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

\ntrue to sort in descending order; otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx xxxx xx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxx$ xxxxxxxxx$ $xxxxxx$xxxxx$$xxxxxx$.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets the name of the column to use as the display field.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxx xx xxx xx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets the name of the column to use for sorting.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxx xx xxx xxx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets a value that indicates whether to sort in descending or ascending order.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx x xxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xx xxxx xx xxxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source: true if the column will be sorted in descending order; otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx xxx xxxxxx xxxx xx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxx$ xxxxxxxxx$ $xxxxxx$xxxxx$$xxxxxx$.$$x$$x
